name: Lunge hero
description:
My first JS game. A very simple roguelike with 6 floors and 10 items, inspired by Hopelite and DCSS.

i've wanted to add more things but my poor time management bogged me down. Ouch.

wasd to move, 1~6 to use an item, e or r to perform ability.

Credits for assets:

http://www3.wind.ne.jp/DENZI/diary/

https://opengameart.org/content/32x32-fantasy-portrait-set

https://nluqo.github.io/broughlike-tutorial/index.html
